attributes.action: Why Should we Pay  €60bn Divorce to EU? EU have has enough UK funds.
attributes.additional_details: Holding the UK over a barrel should be a NO GO!  As stated €60bn could go to the NHS, homeless, deprived Adults/Children/Elderly/Ex-Forces/Disabled/Our Fishing Industry, the gets longer and these are the most important things which require funding. Why should the EU sit there Blackmailing our government while we have so much poverty at home here in the UK... We should be also cutting the costs down now not in 2 years. Just think what 2 years money could help with.
attributes.background: Why Should we Pay  €60bn Divorce to the EU? The EU have had enough UK funds.If you think they have had enough UK funds please sign the petition. If we do pay it should not be paid until our deal is sorted! €60bn could go to the NHS, Homeless, Deprived Adults/Children/Elderly/Ex-Forces/Disabled!
